{"step_by_step_thinking": "The anesthetic was administered at the ischial spines, which is the landmark for pudendal nerve block. The pudendal nerve provides sensory innervation to the posterior vulva, perineum, and lower vagina, and motor innervation to the external anal sphincter. Therefore, the anesthetized nerve also supplies the external anal sphincter.", "answer_choice": "B. External anal sphincter"}
